document.full_text: despite daily drug killings that have made ciudad juarez one of the most dangerous cities in the americas, the city's export manufacturing plants are boosting exports and adding thousands of jobs driven by a recovering u.s. demand, authorities said.
document.title: mexico border city exports boom despite violence
lines_and_colors: despite daily drug killings that have made ciudad juarez one of the most dangerous cities in the americas, the city's export manufacturing plants are boosting exports and adding thousands of jobs driven by a recovering u.s. demand, authorities said.
